trans-unit.source: <token>firstref_zumo</token> enables clients to request a service-specific token for an authenticated user by using REST APIs.
trans-unit.target: <token>firstref_zumo</token> enables clients to request a service-specific token for an authenticated user by using REST APIs.

trans-unit.source: The returned token is used to make subsequent authenticated requests to the mobile service.
trans-unit.target: The returned token is used to make subsequent authenticated requests to the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: The REST API includes the following authentication operations.
trans-unit.target: The REST API includes the following authentication operations.

trans-unit.source: Requests that <token>nextref_zumo</token> initiate authentication using a specific identity provider.
trans-unit.target: Requests that <token>nextref_zumo</token> initiate authentication using a specific identity provider.

trans-unit.source: The returned token is used to make subsequent authenticated requests to the mobile service.
trans-unit.target: The returned token is used to make subsequent authenticated requests to the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: When using service-directed login, <token>nextref_zumo</token> initiates an OAuth flow that enables your client to login to <token>nextref_zumo</token> by using the requested identity provider.
trans-unit.target: When using service-directed login, <token>nextref_zumo</token> initiates an OAuth flow that enables your client to login to <token>nextref_zumo</token> by using the requested identity provider.

trans-unit.source: Requests an authentication token from <token>nextref_zumo</token> by using an identity token already obtained from an identity provider.
trans-unit.target: Requests an authentication token from <token>nextref_zumo</token> by using an identity token already obtained from an identity provider.

trans-unit.source: The token presented to <token>nextref_zumo</token> for authentication must be obtained by the client independent of <token>nextref_zumo</token>, usually by using the providers SDK, such as the Facebook SDK for iOS.
trans-unit.target: The token presented to <token>nextref_zumo</token> for authentication must be obtained by the client independent of <token>nextref_zumo</token>, usually by using the providers SDK, such as the Facebook SDK for iOS.

trans-unit.source: Use client-initiated authentication when your app obtains an identity token to enable single sign-on or get additional user information using the provider SDK.
trans-unit.target: Use client-initiated authentication when your app obtains an identity token to enable single sign-on or get additional user information using the provider SDK.
